response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors, offering unparalleled value and efficiency. Considering its worth and potential impact, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at our suggested price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
